name: Noir
text: I need your help Pastel. I can’t do it without you.

name: Noir
text: I’m sorry for giving you a hard time.

name: Noir
text: But so long as we’re bound together we have a responsibility to each other.

name: Noir
text: Sometimes it's the hardest thing. Waking up in the morning.

name: Noir
text: But nothing is going to change. Nothing is going to get better.

name: Noir
text: Not if you give up now.

name: Pastel
text: I just don’t feel like I'm ready yet...

name: Noir
text: Just tell me what you need for me to help you.

name: Noir
text: You’re horrible, I hope you know.

name: Pastel
text: I really messed up though, huh?

name: Noir
text: I'm kicking your ass when we get home.

name: Noir
text: Like you will be ragdolling down the stairs.

name: Noir
text: I am the Copernicus of curbstomp. The Michelangelo of windmill kicks.
